name: Asana
description: Work anytime, anywhere with Asana. Keep remote and distributed teams, and your entire organization, focused on their goals, projects, and tasks with Asana.

name: Azure DevOps
description: Plan smarter, collaborate better, and ship faster with a set of modern dev services

name: Microsoft Azure SQL Database
description: Build apps that scale with managed and intelligent SQL database in the cloud.

name: Azure Storage
description: Massively scalable and secure object storage for cloud-native workloads, archives, data lakes, HPC, and machine learning.

name: BitBucket
description: Bitbucket Cloud is a Git-based code and CI/CD tool optimized for teams using Jira.

name: CircleCI
description: Continuous integration and delivery platform

name: Datadog
description: Cloud monitoring as a service

name: DigitalOcean
description: The developer cloud

name: Discord
description: Use this app to create a Discord source that emits messages from your guild to a Pipedream workflow.

name: GitHub
description: Where the world builds software. Millions of developers and companies build, ship, and maintain their software on GitHub—the largest and most advanced development platform in the world.

name: GitLab
description: GitLab is the most comprehensive AI-powered DevSecOps Platform.

name: Grafana
description: Open and composable observability platform

name: Intercom
description: Intercom is the only solution that combines an AI chatbot, help desk, and proactive support—so you can keep costs low, support teams happy, and customers satisfied.

name: Jenkins
description: The leading open source automation server, Jenkins provides hundreds of plugins to support building, deploying and automating any project.

name: Jira
description: Jira is the #1 agile project management tool used by teams to plan, track, release, and support great software with confidence

name: Microsoft Teams
description: Microsoft Teams has communities, events, chats, channels, meetings, storage, tasks, and calendars in one place.

name: New Relic
description: Real-time performance insights into your software, infrastructure & customer experience

name: Notion
description: Notion is a new tool that blends your everyday work apps into one. It's the all-in-one workspace for you and your team.

name: Postman
description: Postman is the world's leading API platform.

name: Sentry
description: Sentry offers self-hosted and cloud-based application performance monitoring & error tracking that helps software teams see clearer, solve quicker, & learn continuously.

name: Slack
description: Slack is a channel-based messaging platform. With Slack, people can work together more effectively, connect all their software tools and services, and find the information they need to do their best work — all within a secure, enterprise-grade environment.

name: Snyk
description: Find and automatically fix vulnerabilities in your code, open source dependencies, containers, and infrastructure as code — all powered by Snyk’s industry-leading security intelligence.

name: Zendesk
description: Zendesk is award-winning customer service software trusted by 200K+ customers. Make customers happy via text, mobile, phone, email, live chat, social media.

name: Microsoft Outlook
description: Microsoft Outlook lets you bring all your email accounts and calendars in one convenient spot.

name: Gmail
description: Gmail offers private and secure email by Google at no cost, for business and consumer accounts.

name: Google Cloud
description: The Google Cloud Platform, including BigQuery

name: Linear (OAuth)
